mapper.insert: insert into BOARD (board_seq, title, content, writer, password, regdate, readcnt) values (board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{password}, sysdate, #{readcnt})
mapper.update: update BOARD set "TITLE" = #{title}, "CONTENT" = #{content}, WRITER = #{writer} where BOARD_SEQ = #{board_seq} and PASSWORD = #{password}
mapper.select: select "BOARD_SEQ", "TITLE", "CONTENT", "WRITER", "REGDATE", "READCNT" from BOARD where "BOARD_SEQ" > 0 order by "BOARD_SEQ" desc, "REGDATE" desc
mapper.update: update BOARD set READCNT = readcnt + 1 where BOARD_SEQ = #{board_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT article_no, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt FROM article WHERE article_no > 0 ORDER BY article_no DESC, regdate DESC WHERE #{page} <=10
